title: 비교/대조
description: in comparison with..., as opposed to... 등. 예) In comparison with last year, this year's performance is better., We spend 30%, as opposed to 20% in the previous quarter. 보고서 말투로 비교 설명 연습.
examples: In comparison with last year, this year's performance is better.
We spend 30%, as opposed to 20% in the previous quarter.
In contrast to our expectations, results exceeded projections.
learning_points: 비교와 대조 표현을 사용한 체계적 분석

sentences.kr: 작년과 비교해 볼 때, 올해 성과가 더 좋습니다.
sentences.en: In comparison with last year, this year's performance is superior.

sentences.kr: 우리는 30%를 지출하는데, 이는 전 분기의 20%와는 대조적입니다.
sentences.en: We spend 30%, as opposed to 20% in the previous quarter.

sentences.kr: 우리의 예상과는 대조적으로, 결과가 예측을 초과했습니다.
sentences.en: In contrast to our expectations, results exceeded projections.

sentences.kr: 경쟁사와 비교해 볼 때, 우리의 시장 점유율이 더 높습니다.
sentences.en: In comparison with competitors, our market share is higher.

sentences.kr: 전통적 방법과는 달리, 새로운 접근법은 더 효율적입니다.
sentences.en: Unlike traditional methods, the new approach is more efficient.

sentences.kr: 예상과 대조적으로, 실제 비용은 더 낮았습니다.
sentences.en: As opposed to our estimates, actual costs were lower.

sentences.kr: 국내 시장과 비교해 볼 때, 해외 시장에서 더 빠른 성장을 보이고 있습니다.
sentences.en: In comparison with domestic markets, overseas markets show faster growth.

sentences.kr: 이전 모델과는 대조적으로, 새로운 시스템은 훨씬 안정적입니다.
sentences.en: In contrast to the previous model, the new system is much more stable.
